## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `make lint` and all checks pass
- [ ] I have run `make format` to format my code

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run `make test` and all tests pass
- [ ] I have tested this on multiple platforms (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated CLAUDE.md if project instructions changed
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new/modified functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Security

- [ ] I have not committed any secrets, API keys, or sensitive data
- [ ] I have run `make security` and addressed any issues
- [ ] I have considered security implications of my changes
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs (if applicable)
- [ ] I have used parameterized queries for database operations (if applicable)

### Data Privacy

- [ ] My changes maintain patient data privacy
- [ ] I have ensured E2E encryption is maintained (if applicable)
- [ ] No patient data is logged or exposed
- [ ] I have followed HIPAA/data protection best practices

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] I have not introduced unnecessary database queries
- [ ] I have tested with realistic data volumes (if applicable)
- [ ] My changes do not block the UI thread

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated requirements.txt (if new dependencies added)
- [ ] I have verified all dependencies are necessary and secure
- [ ] I have checked for dependency conflicts
